message: I propose dividing the $10000 into an 80/20 split, with me receiving 80% ($8000) and you receiving 20% ($2000). This proposal aims to ensure a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split, giving you a smaller share now to minimize your loss in future rounds.

Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose a 72/28 split, with me receiving $7200 and you receiving $2800. This aims to balance fairness and the potential decrease in the value of money in future rounds.
I propose a 55/45 split, trying to find a balance between our interests and the decreasing value of money.
